sentence.Network_en: The face of the worshipper must be turned towards Mecca.
See! this is the blessing of the worshipper of the Lord.
sentence.Network_cn: 看 哪,敬畏耶和华的人,必要这样蒙福.

sentence.Network_en: Prayer in Islam is a direct link Between the worshipper and God.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊斯兰教的礼拜是穆斯林与真主之间沟通最直接的方式.

entry.def: If you worship a god, you show your respect to the god, for example by saying prayers.

example.ex: I enjoy going to church and worshipping God.

example.tran: 在哭墙前敬拜的犹太人

entry.def: If you worship someone or something, you love them or admire them very much.

example.ex: She had worshipped him for years...
They worship James Brown, Bob Marley and Jimi Hendrix.
example.tran: 他们崇拜詹姆斯·布朗、鲍勃·马利和吉米·亨德里克斯。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who has religious faith
2. someone who admires too much to recognize faults

auth_sentence.content: He was a true sun worshipper and always had to have a tan.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was a true sun worshipper and always had to have a tan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was a true sun worshipper and always had to have a tan.

auth_sentence.content: He seemed alone in the crowd, the only worshipper who wasn't chanting.

auth_sentence.content: In the women's section, one worshipper repeats the Shehada, attesting to her belief in one God, as she converts to Islam.
